articles.title: Teenager's Vocal Cords Paralyzed After COVID in World First - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Days after a SARS-CoV-2 infection, an otherwise healthy teenage girl suddenly had trouble breathing.

articles.title: 10 Painful Signs You Have Post-Romantic Stress Disorder - YourTango
articles.description: Some past relationships take longer than others to get over, but what can one do when one can't move on at all? Here are ten signs you have Post-Romantic Stress Disorder, and a three-step cure to help you move past it.
articles.content:
Do you obsess over his life and spend no time living your own?
You could be suffering from Post Romantic Stress Disorder (P.R.S.D.)
